short_summary: Cancelled Contract Request for Quote - W8482-231288/A (Initial Contract Value: N/A)
full_summary:
==========================================

**Cancelled Tender Announcement**

* **Document Title (English/French):** Cancelled - W8482-231288/A / Annulé - W8482-231288/A
* **Reference Number (English/French):** PW-23-01027596 / PW-23-01027596
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-24
* **Cancellation Date:** Not specified
* **Government of Canada Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Tender Overview**

A Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation has been cancelled. The procurement method employed was Competitive - Open Bidding.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender was open to suppliers who hold a Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) free trade agreement. Other eligible trade agreements include Canada-Korea, Canada-Colombia, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile, Canada-Ukraine, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama, Canada-Peru, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Honduras.

**Areas of Opportunity and Delivery**

This tender was open to suppliers with a global presence. Deliveries were intended for British Columbia and Nova Scotia.

**Contracting and Contact Information**

The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence. The contact person is Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca, (555) 555-5555.

**Important Notice**

Please note that this tender has been cancelled. Any initial expressions of interest or proposals submitted are not being considered further. The Canadian government is not accepting new expressions of interest or proposals for this solicitation. If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Christopher Cauchi directly. The Government of Canada maintains a procurement policy that prioritizes fairness and transparency. Suppliers are advised to visit the Procurement Strategy for Government of Canada Procurement to learn more about our processes and requirements.
==========================================
